original_text: But I have understanding as well as you; I am not inferior to you: yea, who knoweth not such things as these?
korean_text: 나도 너희 같이 생각이 있어 너희만 못하지 아니하니 그같은 일을 누가 알지 못하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: But I have understanding as well as you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나도 너희와 같이 이해가 있으며

sentences.original_text: I am not inferior to you
yea, who knoweth not such things as these?
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 누가 이런 것들을 알지 못하는가?
